title: #137 - A Christmas Pep Talk
itunes:title: #137 - A Christmas Pep Talk
itunes:subtitle: Christmas is in two days. Here’s a super quick pep talk that will remind you of two important things you can do during this season. Merry Christmas! Helpful Companion Links   If Christmas Eve Eve has you feeling squirrelly, listen (or relisten) to...
description:
Christmas is in two days. Here’s a super quick pep talk that will remind you of two important things you can do during this season. Merry Christmas!

Helpful Companion Links

  • If Christmas Eve Eve has you feeling squirrelly, listen (or relisten) to last week’s episode Ten Ideas for a Holiday Reset.
  • Download a transcript of this episode.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
